name: get_invoice_json
description: Get a specific PurchaseInvoice, in JSON format.

guid.description: The guid of the purchase invoice, from the webhook.

pmv.description:
The PaymentMeans version. The default (and deprecated) version 1.0 will give BankPaymentMean, DirectDebitPaymentMean, CardPaymentMean, NppPaymentMean, SeBankGiroPaymentMean, SePlusGiroPaymentMean, SgCardPaymentMean, SgGiroPaymentMean, SgPaynowPaymentMean.

Version 2.0 deprecates BankPaymentMean (now CreditTransferPaymentMean), CardPaymentMean (now CreditCardPaymentMean), NppPaymentMean (now AunzNppPayidPaymentMean), SeBankGiroPaymentMean (now SeBankgiroPaymentMean  -- note the lower 'g' in 'bankgiro'). It also adds OnlinePaymentServicePaymentMean, StandingAgreementPaymentMean, AunzNppPaytoPaymentMean, AunzBpayPaymentMean, AunzPostbillpayPaymentMean, AunzUriPaymentMean.

**code**: The the code of the general ledger account.

**delivery**: The details of the delivery associated with this invoice.
**actual_date**: The actual delivery date.

**building_number**: The building number. Used in SA.

**name**: The name of the deliveyr party.

**document_currency_code**: The ISO 4217 currency for the invoice.
**document_totals**
**payable**: The total invoice amount payable including tax.
**prepaid**: The amount already paid.
**rounding**: The difference between the payable amount and the total invoice amount including tax.
**total**: The total invoice amount, including tax. This is equal to the sum of the invoice_lines (amount_excluding_tax + tax.amount) and the allowances and charges.
**document_type**: The type of document. Only "invoice" for now.
**due_date**: The date the invoice must be payed by. Format "YYYY-MM-DD".
**external_key**: Deprecated. Used for accountants. The id you specified for the organization.
**external_user_id**: Deprecated. Used for the embedded portal retrieval service. The external_user_id you provided when the ShopAccount was created.
**guid**: The GUID of the invoice
**invoice_lines**

**invoice_type**: The type of invoice.
**issue_date**: The date the invoice was issued. Format "YYYY-MM-DD".
**legal_entity_id**: The id of the LegalEntity the invoice was received for.
**note**: The invoice level note.
**order_reference**: Reference to the order. Used for matching the invoice to an order.
**payment_means**: DEPRECATED - Use the new payment_means_array array.
**iban**: The IBAN to which to transfer.
**id**: An id to mention in the transfer.
**payment_means_array**: The different payment means that can be used to pay the invoice.
**payment_means_payment_id**: DEPRECATED - use the payment_id property in the payment_means_array
**payment_terms_note**: A textual description of the payment terms.
**period_end**: The end date of the period this invoice relates to. Format "YYYY-MM-DD".
**period_start**: The start date of the period this invoice relates to. Format "YYYY-MM-DD".
**project_reference**: Reference to the project.
**sender**
**billing_contact**

**first_name**: The first name of the billing contact.
**last_name**: The last name of the billing contact.
**building_number**: The building number. Used in SA.
**city**: The city.
**country**: The country.
**county**: The county.
**department**: The department who sent the invoice.
**identifiers**: The array of identifiers for this sender.
**legal_name**: The legal name of the party who sent the invoice.
**line1**: The address
**line2**: The address, line 2
**neighborhood**: The neighborhood. Used in SA.
**party_name**: The party who sent the invoice.
**peppol_identifiers**
**corppass**
**client_redirect_fail_url**: The URL the CorpPass system will redirect to in case of a failure to perform identity verfication.
**client_redirect_success_url**: The URL the CorpPass system will redirect to in case of successful identity verfication.
**corppass_url**: The CorpPass redirect URL.
**enabled**: Whether or not the CorpPass flow is enabled. (default: false)
**flow_type**: The CorpPass flow type.
**signer_email**: The email of the person who is going to perform the CorpPass process.
**signer_name**: The name of the person who is going to perform the CorpPass process.
**simulate_corppass**: Whether or not CorpPass is being simulated. (default: false)
**status**: The status of the CorpPass process.
**identifier**: The identifier.
**scheme**: The scheme of the identifier. See <<_receiver_identifiers_list>> for a list.
**superscheme**: The superscheme of the identifier. Should always be "iso6523-actorid-upis".
**secondary_number**: The secondary number. Used in SA.
**zip**: The zip code.
**source**: The source the invoice was received from.
**sub_type**: The subtype of document.

**system_generated_primary_image**: Whether or not the document image (PDF) was generated by Storecove. If true, it means the invoice was received without any attachments and Storecove generated one for you. If false, the invoice will contain at least one attachment, which was received from the invoice sender.
**tax_point_date**: The date the invoice was issued for tax purposes. In most countries MUST match the issue_date. Format "YYYY-MM-DD".
**tax_subtotals**

**tax_system**: The tax system of the invoice. Either tax_line_percentages or tax_line_amounts. The first tax system means the invoice lines contain only the tax percentages and the tax amounts are included only in the tax subtotals at the invoice level and so are only calculated at the invoice level. The tax system tax_line_amounts means that in addition to the percentage, each invoice line also contains the tax amount. The tax subtotals at the invoice level are calculated as the sum of the tax of the invoice lines. The distinction between the two tax systems has has implications for rounding.
**vat_reverse_charge**: DEPRECATED - This is now part of each invoice line.
